abstract: Democrats have presented a “mountain of overwhelming evidence, so we have a lot to consider already,” he says.
lead_paragraph: Senator Lamar Alexander, one of four Republicans who have signaled an openness to calling witnesses in President Trump’s impeachment trial, said on Friday that he wouldn’t make up his mind on the matter until after senators had had a chance to question House Democratic impeachment managers and the president’s team.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
